item.title: Scott add a quote by Andy Stanley
item.description: "It is when our hearts are stirred that we become most aware of what they contain." -- Andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by Andy Stanley
item.description: "In the shadow of my hurt, forgiveness feel like a decision to reward my enemy. But in the shadow of the cross, forgiveness is merely a gift from one undeserving soul to another." -- Andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by Andy Stanley
item.description: "The most significant visions are not cast by great orators from a stage. They are cast at the bedsides of our children. The greatest visioncasting opportunities happen between the hours of 7:30 and 9:30 PM Monday through Sunday. In these closing hours of the day we have a unique opportunity to plant the seeds of what could be and what should be. Take every opportunity you get." -- Andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by Andy Stanley
item.description: "Here’s a question every angry man and woman needs to consider: How long are you going to allow people you don’t even like — people who are no longer in your life, maybe even people who aren’t even alive anymore — to control your life? How long?" -- Andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by Andy Stanley
item.description: "As leaders, we are never responsible for filling anyone else's cup. Our responsibility is to empty ours." -- Andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by Andy Stanley
item.description: "Do you think God can be trusted? Or do yo think you need to take things into your own hands?" -- Andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by andy Stanley
item.description: "We don’t drift in good directions. We discipline and prioritize ourselves there." -- andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by andy Stanley
item.description: "The primary reason we do too much is that we have never taken the time to discover that portion of what we do that makes the biggest difference." -- andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by Andy Stanley
item.description: "As believers, we all have the responsibility to leverage our wealth for kingdom purposes." -- Andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by Andy Stanley
item.description: "It takes a habit to break a habit. You can pray every day for a generous heart, but until you start acting in that direction, nothing's going to change." -- Andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by Andy Stanley
item.description: "Where there’s no progress, there’s no growth. If there’s no growth, there’s no life. Environments void of change are eventually void of life." -- Andy Stanley

item.title: Scott add a quote by Andy Stanley
item.description: "Guilt rarely results in positive behavior. But gratitude? Great things flow from a heart of gratitude." -- Andy Stanley
